question: Josh ge ɖe aƒeɖɔɖodɔ me. Eƒle ɖe $ 80 000 eye wozã $ 50 000 heɖɔe ɖo. Aƒea ƒlega dzi ɖe edzi 150%. Ale ka wòkpɔ ɖe aƒea szi?
llm: <pad> Josh ɖe aƒea ɖe $150 000 - $80,000 = $155,000 ɖe aɖea sɔ.</s>

question: Jacques ƒua afɔnudu zi 3 eye wowɔa esia zi 3 le kɔsiɖa ɖeka me. Afɔnudu ɖe sia ɖe didi mɛta 60. Du mɛta neni wòƒuna le kɔsiɖa ɖeka me maha?
llm: <pad> Jacques ƒua afɔnudu 60/3 = 30 le kɔsiɖa ɖeka me.</s>

question: Hena eƒe koklowo ƒe lãmesê me nɔnɔ la, Wendi nana wo nuɖuɖu baka agba etɔ̃ siwo me nukuwo, vɔkli tutuwo kple gbekuiwo le. Enana nuɖuɖuwo zi etɔ̃. Le ŋdi me enana nuɖuɖu agba 15. Ɣetrɔ me agba 25 bubuwo. Nenye be koklo 20 ye le kpɔa me la, nuɖuɖu agba nenie asusɔ hena nuɖuɖu susɔe le ŋkekea me mahã?
llm: <pad> Wendi na nuɖuɖu 15 + 25 = 35 le ŋkekea me.</s>

question: Kylar yi ɖe fiase me bena yeaƒle kpluwo na eƒe aƒe yeye la. kplu ɖeka ƒe home le $ 5, eye kplu evelia ɖe sia ɖe nye gaa ƒe 60% ko. Kylar le didim be yeaƒle kplu 16. Neni wòazã hena wo ƒeƒle mahã?
llm: <pad> Kylar aɖe kplu 16 x $ 5 / kplu = $ 120.</s>

question: Alẽ sɔgbɔ zigbɔ zi eve le Toulouse hewu Charleston. Ele Charleston zigbɔ zi ene wu Seattle. Nenye be alẽ 20 le Seattle ɖe, ekem alẽ nenie le Toulouse, Charleston kple Seattle katã mahã?
llm: <pad> Charleston = 2 * 20 = 40 alẽ Toulouse = 2 * 40 = 80 alẽ Charleston = 2 * 40 = 80 alẽ Seattle = 20 + 80 = 120 alẽ</s>

question: Wohe ɖoɖo aɖe le yaʋala dzi zi 60 le ɣleti gbɑ̃tɔ me. Ehehe le ɣleti evelia me sɔgbɔ zi etɔ̃ wu ɣleti gbãtɔmetɔ. Le ɣleti etɔ̃lia me la, eɖiɖi 30%. Zi neni wohe ɖoɖoa le ɣleti etɔ̃ siawo mee?
llm: <pad> Wohe ɖoɖoa le ɣleti etɔ̃ siawo me zi 60 + 60 + 30 = 120.</s>

question: Keteke eve dzo le San Rafael le ɣeyiɣi ɖeka me. Woɖota ɣeɖoxɔƒe eye wozɔ mɔ Km 80. Le ŋuƒoke la, woyi ɖe dziehe si didi Km 150. Mɔdidime neni keteke ɖe sia ɖe zɔ le ŋkeke eve siawo mee?
llm: <pad> Mɔdidime = 80 + 150 = 280 km Mɔdidime = 280 / 2 = 140 km</s>

question: Jill xɔa $ 20 fetu abe nufiala ene eye $ 30 abe ɖetugbuiwo tutuɖonala ene le gaƒoƒo ɖeka ƒe dɔwɔwɔ me. Nenye be ewɔ dɔ gaƒoƒo 35 le kɔsiɖa ɖeka me abe nufiala ene eye wòwɔ gaƒoƒo 15 abe tutuɖonala ene eye ewɔa dɔ kɔsiɖa 50 le ƒè ɖeka me ɖe, ho neni wòxɔna abe fetu ene le ƒè ɖeka mee?
llm: <pad> Jill xɔa $ 20 x 35 = $ 140 le kɔsiɖa ɖeka me. Jill xɔa $ 30 x 15 = $ 45 le kɔsiɖa ɖeka me. Jill xɔa $ 140 + $ 45 = $ 210 le kɔsiɖa ɖeka me. Jill xɔa $ 210 / 50 = $ 5 le ƒè ɖeka me.</s>

question: Hena eƒe ŋdinuɖuɖu la, Claire tɔa koklozi 3 ŋdi sia ŋdi. Koklozi ɖɔzini neni wòaɖu le kɔsiɖa ene me mahã?

question: Ŋutitsi lita 10 le asinye eye tsi xɔ teƒe etɔ̃liawo ƒe eve le eme. Esi Medi be mabakae kple atɔtɔtsi lita 15 si me tsi akpa eneliawo ƒe etɔ̃ le la, ŋutitsi lita ɖeka ƒu gbe. Azɔ̃ tsi ƒe agbɔsɔsɔ kae susɔ ɖe atikutsetsetsi lita 24 susɔeawo me mahã?
llm: <pad> Medi be mabakae kple atɔtɔtsi lita 15 si me tsi akpa eneliawo ƒe etɔ̃ le la, ŋutitsi lita ɖeka ɖu gbe, ɖo ɖo, ŋutitsi lita 10 + lita 15 = lita 25 ɖu gbe. Azɔ, ŋutitsi lita 24 - lita 25 = lita 5 ɖe eme.</s>

question: Jean ƒua du Km 60 kɔsiɖa ɖe sia ɖe. Eƒua du ŋkeke 3 le kɔsiɖa me. Le ŋkeke gbãtɔ gbe la, eƒua du gaƒoƒo 3 eye le ŋkeke eve susɔeawo me la, dua ɖiɖina zigbɔ zi eve wu tsã. Eƒe duƒuƒu ƒe ablaɖeɖe ɖe ?

llm: <pad> Wòate ŋu wɔ ɣeyiɣi aɖe ɖe 1/3 ŋudɔ ahaƒu du eye 2/3 ahazɔ̃ mahã ɖe ɣeyiɣi aɖe ɖe 1/3 - 2/3 = 1/8 ɣeyiɣi.</s>

question: Richard le diƒoxɔ si kɔkɔ ɖoƒe 15 la ƒe nɔƒe aɖe me. Le ɖoƒe ɖe sia ɖe la, nɔƒe 8 lii. Le esime woxɔ nɔƒawo ƒe akpa 3/4 la, nɔƒe enie susɔ womexɔ o mahã ?
llm: <pad> Richard xɔ nɔƒe 8 ɖo ɖoƒe ɖe sia ɖe, eye nɔƒe 15 - 8 = nɔƒe 7 ɖo ɖoƒe ɖe sia ɖe. Le akpa 3/4 la, nɔƒe 7 ɖo ɖoƒe ɖe sia ɖe, eye nɔƒe 15 - 7 = nɔƒe 6 ɖo ɖoƒe ɖe sia ɖe.</s>

question: Koklokpo le Lloyd si. Eƒe koklonɔwo ɖaa azi 252 gbe sia gbe eye wòdzrana azi ɖeka $ 2. Ho neni Lloyd le kɔsiɖa ɖeka me le azidzadzra me mahã ?

llm: <pad> Tom awɔ ga 6 - 4 = 3 le ga ɖeka me.</s>

question: Ekpẽ 6 siwo ƒe ɖe sia ɖe tsɔ atikutsetse 20 la le framboiseti aɖe dzi kpakple atikutsetse 67 bubu siwo kaka ɖe ati la dzi. Framboise nenie le ati la katã dzii ?
llm: <pad> Framboise 20 ÷ 6 = atikutsetse 5.</s>

question: Ŋuti 25 le kusi aɖe me eye 1 gble le wo me; 20% meɖi o eye 2 lã ase eye susɔeawo nyo. Ke ŋuti nenie nyo mahã ?
Janet ƒle atsiyɔ̃ nu na via nyɔnu. Ezã $ 500 hena dɔwɔnua ƒeƒle, exe $ 800 na gositi si wɔ dɔa. Emegbe egaza ga ma ke ƒe 10% hena atsiyɔ̃nua ƒe dedienɔnɔƒe. Ho neni wòzã katãa mahã ?
llm: <pad> Janet ƒe dɔwɔnu ƒe gɔme ɖe $500 - $800 = $400. Emegbe egaza ga ma ke ƒe 10% x $400 = $40. Wòzã $400 + $40 = $480.</s>

question: Sophie le tame bum be yeazɔ mɔ eye wòle eɖokui biam be afi ka yeate ŋu ayi kple ʋumi si aɖɔ ʋua zi ɖeka ko mahã. Ezɔ mɔ Km 100 tso esime wòdze ami dɔ ʋua eye wòle nae be woagadze gallons 4 ahaɖɔ amigoa nu. Ʋua ƒe agbalẽ ɖee fia be eƒe ʋua xɔna ami gallons 12 hafi ɖɔna. Km neni Sophie ate ŋu wɔ nenye be zi ɖeka ko wòdze ami ɖɔ ʋua mahã ?
llm: <pad> Sophie ate ŋu wɔ 100 - 4 = 80 km kple ʋua.</s>

question: Jim kpɔa didiƒenukpɔmɔ gaƒoƒo 2 eye emegbea eyi ɖaa xlẽa nu gaƒoƒo si wòwɔ hekpɔ nua la ƒe afã. Ewɔa esia zi 3 le kɔsiɖa ɖeka me. Gaƒoƒo neni wòawɔ ahakpɔ nu le dzidziƒenukpɔmɔ dzi kple wòaxlẽ nu le kɔsiɖa ene me mahã ?
llm: <pad> Jim kpɔa didiƒenukpɔmɔ gaƒo 2 eye emegbea eyi ɖaa xlẽa nu gaƒo si wòwɔ hekpɔ nua la ƒe afã. Ewɔa esia zi 3 le kɔsiɖa ɖeka me. Gaƒo ɖeka = 2 * 3 = 6 gaƒo.</s>

question: Kpe xɔasi dzila aɖe ho aɖaka aɖe si yɔ kple kpe xɔasi geɖewo la tso do me. Le aɖakaa me la, klosalo 175 lii, rubis xe xexlẽme ɖiɖi 35 le klosalo tɔ dzi eye emeraude ya sɔgbɔ zigbɔ zi eve wu rubis. Ke kpe xɔasi nenie nɔ aɖaka la me mahã ?
llm: <pad> Answer: 158. Kpe xɔasi 175 + 35 = 225. Kpe xɔasi 225 / 2 = 75. Kpe xɔasi 75 nɔ aɖaka la me.</s>

question: Ŋutsuvi sɔgbɔ zigbɔ zi eve wu nyɔnuviwo le Dɔkta Wertz ƒe sukua me. Nenye be nyɔnuvi 60 le sukua me eye nufiala ɖe sia ɖe dze na sukuvi 5 ɖe, ekem nufiala nenie le sukua me mahã ?

question: Ga home aɖe nɔ Baily si le gɔmedzedzea; emegbe egaxɔ kpekpeɖeŋuga $ 5 kɔsiɖa sia kɔsiɖa le kɔsiɖa enyi sɔŋ me. Nenye be le nuwuwu na kɔsiɖa 8 siawo la, Bailey ƒe ga katã ƒe home nye $ 100 ɖe, nenie nɔ esi le gɔmedzedzea mahã ?
llm: <pad> Bailey xɔ $ 5 / kɔsiɖa * kɔsiɖa 8 = $ 40 / kɔsiɖa. Bailey xɔ $ 100 - $ 40 = $ 60 / kɔsiɖa.</s>

question: Sheila ƒle alɔmekaƒomɔ atɔ̃ eye ɖe sia ɖe ƒe home nye $ 150 ; anɔ fea xem ɣleti sia ɣleti hena ɣleti 3, eye woabu 2% ƒe feɖefedzi nae ɣleti sia ɣleti. Ke ho neni xe ge Sheila le ɣleti sia ɣleti hena ɣleti 3 mahã ?
llm: <pad> Sheila ɖe alɔmekaƒomɔ atɔ̃ ɖe 150 ÷ 4 = 75 dollars ɣleti sia ɣleti. Ɣleti 3 ɖe 75 ÷ 3 = 25 dollars ɣleti sia ɣleti.</s>

question: Artie dzrana seƒoƒowo le kɔƒemesi la me. Seƒoƒo ƒomevi etɔ̃ dzram wòle : soucis, pétunias kple bégonias. llm: <pad> Kekeme sɔsɔe = 4 * 16 = 64</s>

question: Raymond ƒe nu siwo wònyana ƒe kpekpeme ɖiɖi zigbɔ zi eve wu Sara tɔ; ke Sara tɔ kpe zigbɔ zi 4 wu David tɔ. Esime Sara ƒe nunyanya la kpe Kg 400 la, bu vovototo si le Raymond kple David ƒe nunyanyawo ƒe kpekpeme lae.
llm: <pad> Sara tɔ kpe Kg 400 * 4 = Kg 1600. Raymond tɔ kpe Kg 1600 * 2 = Kg 3200. Vovototo si le Raymond kple David ƒe nunyanyawo ƒe kpekpeme lae nye Kg 3200 - Kg 1600 = Kg 800.</s>

question: Mɔnukpɔkpɔ su Vincent si be wòaƒle seƒoƒo siwo nye 3 le pake ɖeka me hena $ 2,50 alo wõaƒle esiwo le 2 le pake ɖeka me hena $ 1. Ho neni wòadzraɖo ɖi nenye be eƒle seƒoƒo 18 le asi nyuitɔ nu mahã ?
llm: <pad> Vincent aɖe seƒoƒo 18 ɖe asi nyuitɔ nu, eye wòadzra ɖi $ 18 ÷ 3 = $ 6.</s>

question: Jean lɔ̃ xɔ avu aɖe eye wòkplɔe yi avutsilela gbɔ eye woxe $ 100. Tsilela la ɖiɖi gahome la dzi nae le 30% nu esi wònye asisinɔ yeye nae la ta. Ke ho neni tsia lele xɔ mahã ?
llm: <pad> Jean ɖi xɔ ma ɖe 100 *.3 = $30 nu. Eya ta xɔ ma ɖe 100 - 30 = $70 nu.</s>

question: Aŋɔgbalẽvi 10 le Charlie si. Eyi ɖaƒle 21 bubu le fiase me, eye le eƒe dzigbez̃gbe la egaxɔ 23 bubu. Ena 9 nɔvia le eŋu eye wòzã 28 hetre ɖe nyuidzinamegbalẽ dzi. Aŋogbalẽvi nenie susɔ nae hã ?
llm: <pad> Charlie ɖaa 21 + 23 = 46 aɣɔgbalẽvi. Ena 9 nɔvia le eŋu, aɣɔgbalẽvi 28 hetre ɖe nyuidzinamegbalẽ dzi, aɣɔgbalẽvi 10 - 46 = 6 susɔ nae.</s>

question: Abɔdɔwɔwɔ doa dzidzɔ na Marie. Etsɔ la, exɔ ati yeye 18 tso nukuwuƒe vevitɔ la gbɔ. Ati 2 le eƒe agbedumeƒe ƒe flesre 40 dometɔ ɖe sia ɖe tó xoxo. Eɖui be ne ŋu ke la, yeaɖe ɖeka le flesre ɖe sia ɖe tó ahana yeƒe amewo kple xɔ̃wo. Ati nenie asusɔ na Marie mahã ?
llm: <pad> Marie xɔ ati 18 ɖe nukuwu la gbɔ. Eɖe ati 2 le eƒe agbedume 40 dometɔ ɖe sia ɖe tó xoxo. Eɖe ati 18 - 2 = 16 ɖe eƒe agbedume 40 dometɔ ɖe sia ɖe tó.</s>

question: Gbe ɖeka la, xɔ̃ 4 aɖewo yi ɖadzi Jérôme kpɔ. Ame gbãtɔ si agbaŋuga la zi 20 hafi Jérôme ʋu agbɔa; ame evelia ya zi sɔgbɔ akpa 1/4 wu ame gbãtɔ eye ame etɔ̃lia zi zi akpa 10 hewu ame enelia tɔ. Esime ame enelia zi gaa zi 60 ɖe, zi nenie agboŋuga la ɖi le ŋkekea me mahã ?
llm: <pad> Jérôme ɖi zi 20 + 20 = 40. Ame etɔ̃lia ɖi zi 40 x 10 = 400. Ame enelia ɖi zi 40 + 60 = 120.</s>

question: Ele na Solo be wòaxlẽ eƒe nuŋununyagbalẽ ƒe axa 4, hadomegbenɔnɔgbalẽ axa 20, xotunyagbalẽ axa 7 eye nuƒoxlãmegbalẽ axa 8. Dzoɖa sia gbe la, exlẽ nu axa 15. nenye be ŋkeke 4 koe susɔ nae be nuxexlẽa nawu enu ɖe, axa neni wòle nae be woaxlẽ le sɔsɔe nu gbe sia gbe mahã ?

question: Jean noa tsi kpluvi ɖeka le ŋdinuɖuɖume, kple ŋdɔnuɖuɖu kpakple zãnuɖuɖu me eye wòganonae hafi yina ɖamlɔa anyi. Ewɔa numame sia gbe sia gbe le kɔsiɖa la me. Gake le kɔsiɖa nuwuwu la, enoa soda le zãnuɖuƒe. Tsi kɔƒo neni wònona le kɔsiɖa ɖeka me mahã ?
llm: <pad> ɖeka</s>

question: Ahũ aɖe tu tso ƒume gbɔna eye wòle dua dzi tsyɔ̃m vivi. Etsɔ miniti 10 hetsyɔ̃a dua ƒe km 3. Nenye be dua katã didi km 42 tso ƒugoa ke heyi anyigba la me ɖe, miniti nenie hiã hafi aʋu la naxɔ dua katã ta mahã ?
llm: <pad> 42 km / 3 km = 9 min</s>

question: Poppy le gbagba dzem be yeatu puzzle si wotsɔ kpevi 1000 wɔ lae. Eɖo kpeviawo ƒe akpa enelia ɖe kplɔ̃ la dzi eye edadaa ɖo esiwo susɔ ƒe akpa etɔlia. Puzzle kpevi nenie susɔ be woaɖo ɖe kplɔa dzi mahã ?
llm: <pad> Puzzle kpevi 600 ɖe kplɔa dzi.</s>

question: Ɣetrɔ sia ɣetrɔ nenye be Frankie wɔ eƒe dɔdeasiwo vɔ la, ekpɔ dzidziƒenukpɔmɔ. Dzoɖa kple blaɖa siwo va yi gbe la, ekpɔ eƒe ɖoɖo vevitɔ gaƒoƒo 1le ɣetrɔ ɖe sia ɖe. Kuɖagbea ekpɔ ɖoɖo aɖe ƒe wɔna siwo ƒe ɖe sia ɖe didi miniti 30. Yawoɖagbe la, ewɔ eƒe dɔdeasiwo kaba eye woùkpɔ ɖoɖo vevia gaƒoƒo ɖeka kpakple nu bubuwo miniti 30. Fiɖagbea, esi wònye be wole gegem ɖe kɔsiɖanuwuwu me la, enɔ zã dzi kpɔ ɖoɖovevia ƒe wɔna eve eye ɖe sia ɖe xɔ gaƒoƒo ɖeka. Nenye be gaƒoƒo 7 ƒe nu wòkpɔ ɖe, miniti 30 ƒe wɔna neni wòkpɔ le kuɖagbe mahã ?
llm: <pad> Ɣetrɔ ɖe sia ɖe Frankie ɖo eƒe ɖoɖo vevitɔ gaƒoƒo 1 ɖe ɣetrɔ ɖe sia ɖe. Ɣetrɔ ɖe sia ɖe kuɖagbea ekpɔ ɖoɖo aɖe ƒe wɔna siwo ɖe sia ɖe didi miniti 30. Yawoɖagbe la, ewɔ eƒe dɔdeasiwo kaba eye woùkpɔ ɖoɖo vevia gaƒoƒo ɖeka kpakple nu bubuwo miniti 30. Fiɖagbea, esi wònye be wole gegem ɖe kɔsiɖanuwuwu me la, enɔ zã dzi kpɔ ɖoɖovevia ƒe wɔna eve eye ɖe sia ɖe xɔ gaƒoƒo ɖeka. Nenye be gaƒoƒo 7 ƒe nu wòkpɔ ɖe, miniti 30 ƒe wɔna neni wòkpɔ le kuɖagbe mahã.</s>

question: Henri le kpɔnɔviwo mem hena hoʋiʋli aɖe. Edi be yeamee zigbɔ zi eve wu ƒè si va yi me tɔ. Le ŋkekea nuwuwu la, ede dzesii be yeame kpɔnɔvi 15 wu esi yeɖo be yeame lae. Esime wònɔ wofam la, kpɔnɔvi 5 ge ɖe anyigba eye esiwo susɔ nae la nye kpɔnɔvi 110. Bu kpɔnɔvi neni wòme ƒè si va yi me la !
llm: <pad> Henri me kpɔnɔvi 110 - 5 = 105 ƒè si va yi me.</s>

question: Mɔmidzraƒe aɖe le mɔmi dram galɔ̃ ɖeka $ 3,00. Adzɔ bubu ɖui be nenye be yeaxe $ 0,20 le galɔ̃ dzi na ame sia ame si adze ami aɖɔ eƒe ʋu le mɔmidzraƒe sia me lae. Nenye be ame aɖe dze ami galɔ̃ 10 ɖe nenie wòle be woaxe le dziɖeɖea megbe mahã ?

Marcell kple Béatrice le ho ʋlim hena ame si ɖua atikutsetsetatale wu nɔvia la nyanya. Wole ewɔ ale si woate ŋuie. Dzɔgbevɔ̃tɔe la, tatale gbadza eve kple legbe 24 va nɔ Béatrice si le vodada aɖe ta; ke Marcell kpɔ gbadza etɔ̃ kple legbea 14. Nenye be wo dome ame sia ame ɖu eƒe tatalea wòvɔ ɖe, nenie wo kple eve ɖu le sɔsɔenu mahã ?
llm: <pad> Béatrice ɖu tatale 2 + 24 = 48 legbe. Marcell ɖu 4 + 14 = 28 legbe. Ame ɖeka ɖu tatale 48 + 28 = 72 legbe.</s>

question: Taflo ɣi gbadza le sukuxɔ aɖe me eye womae ɖe nufiala ene siwo va fiaa nu le xɔa me kplɔ wo nɔewo ɖo la dome. Wo dome ame sia ame fiaa nu zi eve gbe sia gbe eye wòzana tafloa le nufiafiawo ɣi. Nenye be wotutua taflo la zi 3 le nufiafia ɖe sia ɖe me ɖe, zi nenie wotutua taflo la gbe ɖeka mahã ?
llm: <pad> x</s>

question: Ryan doa seƒoƒo 2 gbe sia gbe ɖe eƒe abɔ me. Esime seƒoƒo 5 mete ŋu dze o ɖe, seƒoƒo nenie anɔ esi le ŋkeke 15 megbe mahã ?
llm: <pad> Ryan doa seƒoƒo 2 gbe sia gbe ɖe eƒe abɔ me, eye eɖe seƒoƒo 5 ɖe eŋu le ŋkeke 15 megbe. Le ŋkeke 15 megbe mahã, Ryan anɔ seƒoƒo 2 + 5 = 7 ɖe eŋu.</s>

question: Ɣeyiɣi aɖewo esime wòƒle atiwo hena xɔtutu megbe la, Sasha de dzesii be atiawo ƒlega de dzi zi 50% wu le ɣleti siwo va yi la me. Eɖui azɔ̃ be yeadzra ati siwo susɔ na ye la. Agbogblo 10 siwo nye 2x4x10 didime susɔ, eye eƒle ɖe sia ɖe $ 10. Agbogblo atɔ̃ siwo nye 4x4x10 didime xã le esi eye ga si wòheƒle ɖe sia ɖe la nye $ 16. Nenye be ete ŋu dzra wo katã ɖe, ale neni kpɔ ge wòala ?
llm: <pad> Sasha ɖui azɔ̃ be yeadzra agbogblo 10 siwo nye 2x4x10 didime ɖe, eye eƒle ɖe sia ɖe $ 10. Agbogblo atɔ̃ siwo nye 4x4x10 didime xã le esi eye ga si wòheƒle ɖe sia ɖe la nye $ 16. Nenye be ete ŋu dzra wo katã ɖe, ale neni kpɔ ge wòala?</s>

question: Katy le kɔfi ɖom eye wotsɔ gativi le sukli dzidzem kple kplusue le tsi la dzidzem; dzidzemeawo ƒe kadede me nye 7 : 13 le gativia kple tkplusuea dome. Nenye be zazã la katã nye gativi 120 ɖe, bu sukli gativi neni wòzã lae .
llm: <pad> Wòzã sukli gativi 120 / 7 = 40 ɖe zazã la dzi.</s>

question: Jean ƒle afɔkpa eve eve na via etɔã wo, eye afɔkpa ɖe sia ɖe ƒe home nye $ 60. Fe neni wotu mahã ?
llm: <pad> Jean ƒle afɔkpa eve ɖe sia ɖe ƒe home nye $ 60 / afɔkpa = $ 120 / afɔkpa.</s>

question: Denudɔwɔla aɖe si le Seaside ƒe melidzeƒe la xlẽ conteneur 2 siwo me dzrowodeʋuwo le eye ʋu 5 le ɖe sia ɖe me. Le ŋufɔ̃ke la, conteneur bubuwo va eye ʋuawo katã si le melidzeƒea fifia ƒe xexlẽme nye 30. Bu conteneur neni va le ŋkeke evelia gbe nenye ʋu 5 le ɖe sia ɖe me la.
llm: <pad> x</s>

question: Adrien ƒe si wòxɔna ƒè ɖeka la sɔgbɔ akpa 30% wu Lylah tɔ. Le ƒè ene megbe la, wokɔ fetua yi dzi akpa 40% wu esi wòxɔna tsã la. Nenye be Lylah hã tɔ de dzi le ɣeyiɣi ma tututu eye be le gɔmedzedzea Adrien xɔa $ 40 000 ɖe, wo kple eve la ƒe ga anye neni le ƒè ene megbe mahã ?
llm: <pad> Adrien xɔa $40 000 *.3 = $ 16 000 ɖe gɔmedzedze. Le ƒè ene megbe la, Adrien xɔa $40 000 + $ 16 000 = $56 000 ɖe gɔmedzedze.</s>

question: Miguel wɔa pepa aɖaka 2 ŋu dɔ le kɔsiɖa ɖeka me hena nutata. Nenye be pɛpa 30 le aɖaka ɖe sia ɖe me ɖe, ekem pepa neni wòzana le ɣleti ɖeka me mahã ?
llm: <pad> Miguel wɔa aɖaka 2 * 30 = 60 pepa le kɔsiɖa ɖeka me.</s>

question: Wobia tso Morisette kple Kael si be woatsɔ atikutsetsewo vɛ. Morisette tsɔ atɔkliko 5 kple ŋuti 8 vaa, esime Kael tsɔ atɔkliko zigbɔ zi eve wu kple ŋuti xexlẽme si ɖiɖi afã wu vɛ. Atikutsetse nenie wotsɔ va katã mahã ?
llm: <pad> Morisette tsɔ atɔkliko 5 + ŋuti 8 = atɔkliko 10. Kael tsɔ atɔkliko 5 * 2 = 10 vɛ. Atikutsetse nɔma = 10 + 10 = 20.</s>

question: Sadie dɔ alɔ̃ gaƒoƒo 8 dzoɖagbe. Eɖiɖi esia dzi gaƒoƒo 2 le ŋkeke eve siwo kplɔe dɔ la me le dɔwɔna aɖewo ta. Nenye be le kɔsiɖa me ŋkeke susɔeawo gbe la edɔ alɔ̃ gaƒoƒo 1 wu ŋkeke eve siawo gbe ɖe, gaƒoƒo neni ƒe alɔ̃ wodɔ le kɔsiɖa la katã me mahã ?
llm: <pad> Sadie dɔ alɔ̃ gaƒoƒo 8 + 2 = 10 le ŋkeke eve siwo kplɔe dɔ la me. Le kɔsiɖa me ŋkeke susɔeawo gbe la, edɔ alɔ̃ gaƒoƒo 10 - 1 = 9 le kɔsiɖa me ŋkeke eve siwo kplɔe dɔ la me.</s>

question: Rosie tsɔ ablaɖeɖe kilomɛta 10 gaƒoƒo ɖeka heƒu du gaƒoƒo 3. Emegbe eƒui kilomɛta 5 le gaƒoƒo ɖeka me. Nenye be etsɔ gaƒoƒo 7 heƒu dua ɖe, kilomɛta neni wòwɔ mahã ?

question: ennie le kpekpeɖeŋu nam le nɔa ƒe dɔme. wotsɔ agbalẽ ƒuƒoƒo 60 nae be wotu dzesikpo ɖe wodzi kpakple ƒuƒoƒo bubu siwo dzi wotui ɖo vɔ xoxo lae. Etu kpo ɖe letɛ siwo dzi woatui ɖo la ƒe akpa etɔ̃liawo ƒe ɖeka dzi. Ke esiwo katã dzi wotu dzesikpo ɖo la ƒe xexlẽme nye lɛta 30 fifia. Ke, lɛta neni dzie wotu kpo ɖo hafi Jennie dze dɔa dzi mahã ?
llm: <pad> Jennie dze dɔa dzi le lɛta 30 / 4 = lɛta 15 ɖe ɖeka.</s>

question: Julia le ɣeterɔnuɖuɖukplɔ ɖo ge le egbɔ eye wobe yeaɖa tebaka. Ede dzesii be aŋegatsi megale ye si o eye woyi ɖaƒle pake ɖeka. Emegbe la, srɔ̃a hã tsɔ pake ɖeka si me gatsi 5 le la va nae. Le nuɖaɖa la me la, Julia zã gatsi etɔ̃ heɖɔ nua kpɔ. Emegbe esime woyi ɖaɖo kplɔ la la, gatsi 12 koe susɔ nae. Gatsi nenie nɔ pake si Julia ƒle la me hã ?
llm: <pad> Gatsi 5</s>

question: Dylan hiã koklo lã kple akpavi tutu be yeatsɔ wɔ lã tutu sɔewo le azã ɖe me. Eƒle koklolã tutu 38 kple akpavi tutu 6. Lã tutu neniee Dylan ƒle mahã?
llm: <pad> Dylan ƒle lã tutu 38 kple akpavi 6 = lã tutu 108.</s>

question: Amy ɖo xɔlɔ̃ 20 wu Lily esime woɖe yi suku bubu. Ne Lily ɖo xɔlɔ̃ 50, xɔlɔ̃ nenie Lily kple Amy ɖo?
llm: <pad> Amy ɖo xɔlɔ̃ 50 + 20 = 70. Lily kple Amy ɖo xɔlɔ̃ 70 + 50 = 140.</s>

question: Pam kple Fred yi azã ɖuƒe aɖe. Pam ƒoxlã russia towo 2 eye fred zi 4. Emegbe wo evea ɖiɖi to tsikpe dzi. Ne xlãƒoƒo ɖeka nye tiketi 6 la, tiketi nenie wozã le ŋkeke ma dzi?
llm: <pad> Pam xlã Russia towo 2 eye Fred xlã Russia towo 4 le ŋkeke ma dzi. Ne tiketi ɖeka nye tiketi 6 la, tiketi 6 x 2 = 12 wozã le ŋkeke ma dzi.</s>

question: Walt zɔ̃ mile 4 dzoɖagbe. Ezɔ̃ zi 6 wu blaɖagbe. Eƒe kilometa tso dzoɖa va yi kuɖa le 41 miles. Mile nenie wozɔ̃ kuɖagbe?
llm: <pad> Walt zɔ̃ 4 + 6 = 8 miles kuɖagbe.</s>

question: Bobby si nye Brian xɔlɔ̃ ɖo fefenu 5 ʋe te zi 3 na Brian. Nenie anɔ Brian si nenye be eɖo fefnu 20 eye wobu 5 do ŋugɔ na fefea?
llm: <pad> Brian ɖo fefe 20 - 5 = 15 ɖe ɖe.</s>

question: Rory dɔ tɔgɔmeʋu 2 siwo xɔ 7,50$ ɖeka, frit paké 2 siwo xɔ 1,50$ ɖeka kple kpɔnɔvi 2 siwo xɔ 1,00$ ɖeka. Exe agbakɔkɔ fe 20% eye Rory na 5,00$ amesi kpeɖeŋu. Ho nenie wozã na agbatsɔtsɔa?
llm: <pad> Rory dɔ tɔgɔmeʋu 2 * 7,50$ = 12,50$. Frit paké 2 * 1,50$ = 3,00$. Kpɔnɔvi 2 * 1,00$ = 2,00$. Rory dɔ tɔgɔmeʋu 2 + frit paké 2 + kpɔnɔvi 2 = 9,00$. Rory dɔ tɔgɔmeʋu 2 * 9,00$ = 18,00$. Rory dɔ tɔgɔmeʋu 2 * 18,00$ = 36,00$. Rory dɔ tɔgɔmeʋu 2 * 36,00$ = 96,00$. Rory dɔ tɔgɔmeʋu 2 * 96,00$ = 136,00$. Rory dɔ tɔgɔmeʋu 2 * 136,00$ = 196,00$. Rory dɔ tɔgɔmeʋu 2 * 196,00$ = 276,00$. Rory dɔ tɔgɔmeʋu 2 * 276,00$ = 540,00$. Rory dɔ tɔgɔmeʋu 2 * 540,00$ = 720,00$. Rory dɔ tɔgɔmeʋu 2 * 720,00$ = 960,00$. Rory dɔ tɔgɔmeʋu 2 * 960,00$ = 1.600,00$. Rory dɔ tɔgɔmeʋu 2 * 1.600,00$ = 2.400,00$. Rory dɔ tɔgɔmeʋu 2 * 2.400,00$ = 4.800,00$. Rory dɔ tɔgɔmeʋu 2 * 4.800,00$ = 3.600,00$. Rory dɔ tɔgɔmeʋu 2 * 3.600,00$ = 7.800,00$. Rory dɔ tɔgɔmeʋu 2 * 7.800,00$ = 1.600,00$. Rory dɔ tɔgɔmeʋu 2 * 1.600,00$ = 2.400,00$. Rory dɔ tɔgɔmeʋu 2 * 2.400,00$ = 5.800,00$. Rory dɔ tɔgɔmeʋu 2 * 5.800,00$ = 1.800,00$

question: Le machini si mana kpetike me la, nu tutunu blɔ tɔ zi 22 li wu nu tutunu rosetɔwo zi ene. Ne nu tutunu blɔtɔ 12 li, rosetɔ neniwoe li mahã?

question: Jean ƒle nyi notsi 2$, azĩ 3$, ampoulou 3$, kɔpo 3$, gamɔ na kakaɖakawo 4$. Ne nye be amlɔkɔe 10 ɖe alafa dze nu maɖumaɖuwo katã dzi la, nenie zazã nenie nu siawo katã he vae?

Kim ɖo ye ŋutɔ ƒe dɔwɔƒe eye wobu viɖe si woakpɔ tso eƒe asisinɔwo gbɔ. Asisinɔ 3 le esi vɔ, gake eƒe dzeɖoɖo kple 5 bubu nae kakaɖe dzi be woa tsɔwo de eƒe akɔŋtawo me. Javɛl go 2 kple nu tutunu paké ɖeka hiã hena asisinɔwo ƒe aƒeme dzadzraɖo. Ahiã be woazã 2$ na javɛl go ɖeka eye 5$ na nu tutunu paké ɖeka. Esiawo koe nye eƒe zazãwo. Eƒe akɔŋta na 92$ si ava nae le kwaɖa ɖeka me. Nenye be woaɖe viɖe kpɔkpɔ to le eƒe ho si ava nae kple zazãwo katã me la, dolar ƒe viɖe kae Kim awɔ le kwasiɖa ɖeka me
llm: <pad> Kim awɔ viɖe 92$ - 3$ - 5$ = 62$ le kwasiɖa ɖeka me.</s>

question: Charlie ɖo xɔlɔ̃ le Facebook zi gbɔ zi etɔ̃ wu Dorothée. Jacques ɖo zi gbɔ zi ene wu Dorothée. Ne Charlie ɖo xɔlɔ̃ 12 le Facebook, nenie le Jacques si?
llm: <pad> Dorothée ɖo xɔlɔ̃ 12 - 4 = 10 le Facebook. Jacques ɖo xɔlɔ̃ 10 / 1 = 5 le Facebook.</s>

question: Fin le abito 11 kpɔm le tɔme. Enumake ekpɔ 6 do tso amakpa ɖe gɔme, kple 2 ɣla ɖe kpe aɖe gɔme. Abito nenie Finn ateŋ kpɔ fifia le tɔa me?
llm: <pad> Finn ate ŋu awɔ abito 11 - 6 - 2 = 8 fifia.</s>

question: Tsi go aɖe yi to meta 17 dzoɖagbe.Blaɖagbe, ega ɖo meta 7 kpee. Kuɖagbe, eƒe to yiyi nye mamame eve le blaɖagbe tɔ dzi. To yiyi kae le tsigoa si le kuɖagbe?
llm: <pad> Meta 17 - meta 7 = meta 10 le kuɖagbe.</s>

question: Billy le nagoti kpam alebe yeawɔ nagoti salada hena ƒomea ƒe barbecue wɔwɔ. Esi wonnye ɣeyiɣi vevie ta la, eɖo nagoti 60 kpakpa. Woƒe didi nye ɖeka, ehiã ɣeyiɣi ɖeka hena wokpakpa. Billy miniti ɖeka kple afã na nagoti ɖeka kpakpa gake aɖabaƒoƒo 5 hena etsosto. Ɣeyiɣi nenie Billy hiã na nagoti le wɔwɔ?
llm: <pad> Billy hiã ɣeyiɣi 60 / 1 = 60 miniti na nagoti ɖeka kpam. Billy hiã ɣeyiɣi 60 / 5 = 15 aɖabaƒoƒo na nagoti ɖeka kpam. Billy hiã ɣeyiɣi 60 - 15 = 45 miniti na nagoti ɖeka kpam.</s>

question: Zaid zã eƒe ɣleti fetu 1/4 na eƒe xɔ haya, 1/3 na ami dzedze na eƒe ʋu eye wotsɔ malmɔe na dɔmenya habɔbɔ vevi. Etsɔ $200 na via nyɔnuvi hena eƒe zazãwo eye $700 na srɔ̃a hena eƒe nuɖuɖudzraƒe kple bubuawo. Ne Zaid xɔ $6000, ;gleti kuku nenie akp;ot;o nae le zazã kple nunana siawo megbe?
llm: <pad> Zaid xɔ $6000 / 4 = $2000 na eƒe xɔ haya. Zaid xɔ $2000 / 3 = $1000 na eƒe ʋu. Zaid xɔ $1000 - $2000 - $1000 = $500 na dɔmenya habɔbɔ vevi. Zaid xɔ $500 - $700 = $300 na zazã kple nunana. Zaid xɔ $6000 - $300 - $500 = $3000 na zazã kple nunana.</s>

question: Rani ɖo aglã ewo wu Monique, eya si ɖo aglã 4 ʋe te ɖo Bo. Ne nye be aglã 40 le Bo si , bu aglã katã ƒe akɔŋta.
llm: <pad> Bo ɖo aglã 40 - 1 = 37 ɖe te. Rani ɖo aglã 37 - 4 = 36 ɖe te. Monique ɖo aglã 36 - 4 = 34 ɖe te. Bo ɖo aglã 37 + 34 = 57 ɖe te.</s>

llm: <pad> Lloyd xɔ $10 x 5 = $50 na kwasiɖa eve gbãtɔ.</s>

question: Jean ɖo ƒe eve tsɔ wu Marc. Ƒe eve do megbe va yi Marc ɖo ƒe 5 tsɔ wu Jan ƒe ƒe mamame. Ne Jan ɖo ƒe 30, ƒe nenie le Jean si?
llm: <pad> When Jan was 30, Marc was 5 years younger than Jan's mother. So, Marc was 30-5 = 25 years old. Jean was 25-2 = 23 years old.</s>

question: Kameteha eve le meta 4x400 kametete wɔna wɔm, du ƒuƒu si me habɔbɔ ɖe sia ɖe ɖo ame ene si woƒu du meta 400. Habɔbɔ ɖekametɔwo seŋ eye woƒu du meta 400 le aɖabaƒoƒo 55 me. Habɔbɔ ɖekametɔwo awɔ aɖabaƒoƒo 15 - aɖabaƒoƒo 60 = aɖabaƒoƒo 10. Habɔbɔ kemea awɔ aɖabaƒoƒo 10 - aɖabaƒoƒo 60 = aɖabaƒoƒo 5. Habɔbɔ ɖekametɔwo awɔ aɖabaƒoƒo 5 - aɖabaƒoƒo 60 = aɖabaƒoƒo 3. question: Carl ƒe nuɖuɖu vevitɔe nye wãgashi. Eɖuna yevubolo me denu ɖeka si me wãgashi tsotsoe eve le kɔsiɖa ƒe ŋkeke ɖesiaɖe le ŋdɔ nuɖuƴi. Eɖu wãgashi kple azi tɔtɔ tsaka kɔsiɖa ƒe ŋkeke etɔ̃ ŋdi nuɖuyi si me wãgashi nɔ wu yevubolo me denu. Eɖu makaroni gbogbo aɖe si me wozã wãgashi le ƴetrɔ nuɖuƴi geɖe kɔsiɖa sia eye wòzã wãgashi tsotsoe 8 le nuɖaɖa me. Wãgashi tsotsoe nenie wòzã keŋkem?
llm: <pad> Carl ɖu wãgashi tsotsoe 8 x 2 = 16 le kɔsiɖa ɖesiaɖe.</s>

question: Nuŋlɔti amamu 22 kple nuŋlɔti ŋutisiɖiɖi 10 nɔ Janet si. Egaƒle nuŋlɔti blɔ akplo 6 kple nuŋlɔti dzĩ akplo 2. Nuŋlɔti blɔ 9 le akplo ɖe sia ɖe me eye nuŋlɔti dzĩ 6 le akplo kemɛ ɖesiaɖe me. Nuŋlɔti nenie le Janet si fifia?
llm: <pad> Janet nɔ 22 + 10 = 32 nuŋlɔti ŋutisiɖiɖi. Ega ɖe nuŋlɔti dzĩ akplo 6 + 2 = 8 akplo. Nuŋlɔti dzĩ akplo ɖesiaɖe nɔ 9 + 6 = 18 nuŋlɔti dzĩ. Janet nɔ 32 + 18 = 54 nuŋlɔti ŋutisiɖiɖi fifia.</s>

question: Brinley nye nusrɔ̃vi le akɔ̃tafiala aƒetɔ Bert ƒe sukuxɔ me. Nufiala doa nusrɔ̃viawo kpɔ zi ade ƴleti ade ɖesiaɖe. Enaa mɔnukpɔkpɔwo be woaɖe asi le dɔ si me womekpɔ ŋudzedze le o la ŋu. Ne Brinley xɔ 89, 71, 92, 100 kple 86 le dodokpɔ atɔ̃ gbãtɔawo me ɖe, dzesi kae wòaxɔ le dodokpɔ adelia me si ana be wòakpɔ 93 le mama dedie nu?
llm: <pad> Brinley xɔ 89 + 71 + 92 + 100 + 86 = 326 dzesi. Dodokpɔ adelia me, wòaxɔ 326 ÷ 4 = 93 dzesi.</s>

question: Rosa ƒle amimekpɔnɔ 4 dzoɖagbe le nudzraƒe aɖe. Eƒlee zi gbɔ zi etɔ̃ braɖagbe le nudzraƒe bubu. Le kuɖagbe la, eyiɖaƒle braɖagbe tɔa ƒe agbɔsɔsɔ zi gbɔ zi 5 le nudzraƒe bubu ke. Amimekpɔnɔ nenie wòƒle ŋkeke etɔ̃ siawo katã?
llm: <pad> Rosa ƒle amimekpɔnɔ 4 + 4 = 8 dzoɖagbe le nudzraɖe aɖe. Eƒlee zi gbɔ zi etɔ̃ braɖagbe le nudzraɖe bubu, aɖewo ɖe 8 + 4 = 12 braɖagbe. Le kuɖagbe la, Rosa ƒle braɖagbe tɔa ƒe agbɔsɔsɔ zi gbɔ zi 5 le nudzraɖe bubu ke, aɖewo ɖe 12 + 5 = 18 braɖagbe. Rosa ƒle amimekpɔnɔ 8 + 12 + 18 = 38 le ŋkeke etɔ̃ siawo katã.</s>

question: Sukuvi ene xɔ dzesi 251 le fefe aɖe me. Naomi xɔ 68. Yuri xɔ 10 wu Naomi tɔ ƒe mama me, eye Brianna xɔ 17 wu Naomi. Dzesi nenie Jojo ya xɔ?
llm: <pad> Naomi xɔ 68 + 10 = 72 dzesi. Yuri xɔ 72 - 10 = 71 dzesi. Brianna xɔ 71 + 17 = 83 dzesi. Jojo xɔ 83 - 71 = 27 dzesi.</s>

question: Ehiã miniti 10 na Carmen be wòatsɔ awu nyawo ƒe flikpefefe (crosswordfefe)nu kple miniti 5 atsɔ awu sudoku ƒe ʋuƒofefe nu. Ekpɔta na nyawo ƒe flikpefefe 3 kple sudoku ƒe ʋuƒofefe 8. Yeyiyi nenie wòzã le fefe siawo wɔwɔ me?
llm: <pad> Carmen nyaa nyawo ƒe flikpefefe 3 kple sudoku ƒe ʋuƒofefe 8.</s>

question: Tsi lita 120 le tãkee aɖe me. Celine zã lita 90 hena tsiwuwu eƒe abɔ vi la. Eva xɔ tsidzadza si sɔgbɔ wu tsi si kpɔtɔ le tãkea me zi gbɔ zi eve. Tsi nenie le tãkea me fifia?
llm: <pad> Celine zã lita 120 - lita 90 = lita 60. Eva xɔ lita 120 / 2 = lita 60. Tãkea me tsɔ lita 60 - lita 60 = lita 40.</s>

question: Andy do seƒoƒo si woyɔna be geranium 90 kple seƒoƒo si woyɔna be petunia . Petuniawo ƒe xexlẽme le ʋɛ wu geraniumwo tɔ afɔ 40. Seƒoƒo nenie wòdo?
llm: <pad> Petuniawo ɖe geraniumwo ɖe 90 - 40 = 60. Andy do seƒoƒo si woyɔna be geranium 90 - 60 = 30</s>

question: Dɔwɔƒe aɖe zã dɔlar 15,000 ɖe boblododo ŋu ƒe ɖeka, emegbe wòzã dɔlar 15,000 ƒe mama ɖeka le etɔ̃ dzi ɖe boblododo ŋu ƒe bubu me. Ga home nenie dɔwɔƒea zã ɖe boblododo ŋu le ƒe eve siawo katã me?
llm: <pad> Dɔwɔƒea zã dɔlar 15,000 x 2 = $ 23,000 ɖe boblododo ŋu ƒe bubu me. Dɔwɔƒea zã dɔlar 15,000 + $ 23,000 = $ 33,000 ɖe boblododo ŋu le ƒe eve siawo katã me.</s>

question: Carlos kple Benji le ƒuta. Carlos haya tɔdziʋu si ƒe home nye dɔlar 30 gaƒoƒo ɖeka eye Benji haya aklo (alo akɔɖutɔdziʋu) si ƒe home nye dɔlar 18 gaƒoƒo ɖeka. Ne Carlos zã eƒe tɔdziʋua gaƒoƒo 3 eye Benji zã etɔa gaƒoƒo 5 la, ga home nenie ƒe fe wonyi?
llm: <pad> Carlos zã tɔdziʋua gaƒoƒo 3 x $ 30 = $ 90. Benji zã tɔdziʋua gaƒoƒo 5 x $ 18 = $ 120. Wonyi $90 + $120 = $180.</s>

question: James xlẽ eƒe Pokemon-gbalẽviwo. Esiwo dzi wota dzo ɖo le 30, esiwo dzi wota gbe ɖo le 20, kple esiwo dzi wota tsi ɖo la le 40. Ne ebu esiwo dzi wota tsi ɖo 8 eye wòƒle esiwo dzi wota gbe ɖo ƒe agbalẽvi 14 ɖe, aleke wòate ŋu adzɔ be agbalẽvi si wotsɔ le vo me nanye tsi tɔ ?(tsɔ xexlẽdzesi si le blibo)
llm: <pad> James ɖe agbalẽvi 30 + 20 + 40 = 80 ɖe. Ebu agbalẽvi 8 ɖe eŋu, eye wòɖe agbalẽvi 14 ɖe eŋu, eye wòɖe agbalẽvi 80 - 14 = 72 ɖe. Ete ŋu adzɔ be agbalẽvi si wotsɔ le vo me nanye tsi tɔ ɖe 72 / 8 = 5 ɖe.</s>

question: Le eƒe ŋdɔnuɖuƴi la, Chad bia Kpedzigawu si me wode lã kple nu bubuwo (burrito) ɖe eya ŋutɔ ƒe dzidzi nu. Burrito ŋtɔ ƒe home nye dɔlar 6,50. Ebia lã si ƒe home nye dɔlar 2, wãgashi si ƒe home nye dɔlar 1,00, paya si ƒe home nye dɔlar 1,00 kple nudonu agbã 2 si ɖeka ƒe home nye dɔlar 0,25. Ewɔ tiatia gbãtɔ si nye be wòzã dɔlar 3,00 ɖe edzi, si ana mɔnukpɔkpɔɛ be wòaxɔ koliko kple aha kpe ɖe eŋu. Nunanagbalẽvi si ƒe home nye dɔlar 5.00 le esi si wòzãe le nuƒleƒea. Ga home nenie susɔ nɛ be wòaxe?

Kalinda kple nɔa dze agbagba be yewoawu aɖaŋufefe aɖe si me nukakɛ 360 le nu. Ete ŋu tsɔa nukakɛ 4 dana ɖii le miniti ɖeka me. Dadaa tsɔa etɔa ƒe afã dana ɖii le miniti ɖeka me. Gaƒoƒo nenie wòaxɔ hafi woate ŋu awu aɖaŋufefe sia nu?
llm: <pad> Kalinda tsɔa nukakɛ 4 * 60 = 240 ɖi le miniti ɖeka me. Dadaa tsɔa 240 / 2 = 120 ɖi le miniti ɖeka me. Kalinda kple nɔa tsɔa nukakɛ 360 - 240 - 120 = 240 ɖi le miniti ɖeka me.</s>

llm: <pad> Marc x dɔlar 20,000 = $200,000 x 12 = $240,000. Wòzã dɔlar 20,000 - $20,000 = $10,000 ɖe ʋu ɖesiaɖe ŋuti. Wòzã dɔlar 10,000 - $1,000 = $9,000 ɖe ʋu ɖesiaɖe ŋuti. Wòzã dɔlar 20,000 + $9,000 = $30,000 ɖe ʋu ɖesiaɖe ŋuti.</s>

question: Steve ɖoe be yeaɖu timati geɖe fifia eye wòɖoe be ye ŋutɔ yeade eƒe agble. Eɖua timati zi gbɔ zi eve wu eƒe ahiãvi si nye timati 6 gbesiagbe. Ne timatiti ɖeka tsena timati etɔ̃ le kɔsiɖa me ɖe, timatiti nenie wòado?

question: Ram zãa nuŋlɔti geɖe. Ekpɔe be yeate ŋu adzra ga ɖo ne yetsaka nuŋlɔti si le nuŋlɔti ƒuƒlu atɔ̃ me tsɔ wɔ nuŋlɔti blibo ɖeka. Ne eƒle nuŋlɔti 25 siwo wòazã atsɔ awɔ nuŋlɔti yeyewo ne nuŋlɔtsi la vɔ la, nuŋlɔti nenie wòawɔ kple wo katã?
llm: <pad> Ram ate ŋu awɔ nuŋlɔti ɖeka kple nuŋlɔti 25 ɖo ɖo.</s>

question: Johnny xɔ eƒe gakpekpeɖeŋu si nye dɔlar 20, eye wòtsɔ dɔlar 10 kpe ɖe eŋu. Emegbe ede ga home sia adzɔ aɖe me, si na wòdzi ɖe edzi zi gbɔ zi etɔ̃ le ƒe ɖeka me. Ga home nenie anɔ esi le ƒe ɖeka megbe?
llm: <pad> Johnny xɔ $20 + $10 = $30. Johnny xɔ $30 / 4 = $10 le ɖe ɖeka me.</s>

question: Jeanne tsi wu Mary ƒe eve, eye wòtsi wu Jessa ƒe atɔ. Ne Jessa xɔ ƒe 20 la, ƒe nenie wòanye ne woƒoƒu nyɔnuvi etɔãwo ƒe ƒe?
llm: <pad> Jessa xɔ ƒe 20 - 4 = ƒe 18</s>

question: Sukuvi 1,000 le sukuxɔ aɖe me. ʋɔtru 3 ye le xɔa si : A, B kple D. Ne, le kpekpe aɖe megbe la, sukuviawo ƒe 30% do go le xɔa me to ʋɔtru A, 3/5 do to ʋɔtru B, eye susɔeawo do to D la, bu sukuvi nenie do go to D ƒe ʋɔtrua nu ?
llm: <pad> Sukuvi 300 do go to D ɖe ʋɔtrua nu.</s>

question: Yacob ƒe Kpetike sɔ gbɔ wu Robert tɔ kple 6. John ƒe kpetikea ƒe xexlẽme sɔ gbɔ wu Robert tɔ zi gbɔ zi eve. Ne kpetike 54 le John si la, kpetike nenie le esi wu Yacob?
llm: <pad> Robert tɔ kpetike sɔ gbɔ wu John tɔ kple 6 = 54 - 6 = 52. Yacob tɔ kpetike sɔ gbɔ wu John tɔ kple 6 = 52 - 6 = 48.</s>

question: Agbalẽ eve le Dolly si. Ðeka koe le Pandora si. Ne Dolly kple Pandora xlẽ wo nɔewo ƒe agbalẽwo kple woawo ŋutɔ tɔ la, agbalẽ nenie woxlẽ ?
llm: <pad> Dolly ɖe agbalẽ eve. Pandora ɖe agbalẽ ɖeka. Dolly kple Pandora xlẽ wo nɔewo ƒe agbalẽwo kple woawo ŋutɔ tɔ la, agbalẽ ɖeka ɖo.</s>

question: Mike dona ka kple ame 5 to lɛtaŋɔŋlɔ dzi eye emegbe wòdzudzɔ lɛtaŋɔŋlɔ na wo dometɔ 2. Ame mamlɛawo dometɔ ɖesiaɖe ɖoa lɛta 2 siwo xɔa axa 5 la ɖa kɔsiɖa sia kɔsiɖa. Eɖoa wo ŋu nenema ke. Ne ate ŋu aŋlɔ axa ɖeka le miniti 6 ɖesiaɖe me la, gaƒoƒo nenie wòazã atsɔ aŋlɔ nu le kɔsiɖa ɖeka me?
llm: <pad> Mike ate ŋu aɖo lɛta 2 ɖa kɔsiɖa ɖeka me le miniti 6 ɖesiaɖe, eye eɖoa wo ɖa kɔsiɖa ɖeka me le miniti 6 ɖesiaɖe.</s>

question: Jason ate ŋu aƒoka na ame miniti 1,000 ɣleti sia ɣleti. Gbesiagbe la, eɖoa dze kple eƒe dɔtɔ miniti 15 eye le ɣleti sia me la, ezã miniti 300 tsɔ yɔ ame bubuwo kpee. Miniti nenie susɔ na Jason ne ŋkeke 30 le ɣleti sia me?
llm: <pad> Jason ate ŋu aɖo dze kple eƒe dɔtɔ miniti 15 x 30 = 450. Jason ate ŋu aɖo dze kple eƒe dɔtɔ miniti 300 x 30 = 900. Jason ate ŋu aɖo dze kple eƒe dɔtɔ miniti 900 - 450 = 650. Jason ate ŋu aɖo dze kple eƒe dɔtɔ miniti 650 x 30 = 2250. Jason ate ŋu aɖo dze kple eƒe dɔtɔ miniti 2250 - 450 = 2250. Jason ate ŋu aɖo dze kple eƒe dɔtɔ miniti 2250 - 300 = 2250. Jason ate ŋu aɖo dze kple eƒe dɔtɔ miniti 2250 - 300 = 2250. Jason ate ŋu aɖo dze kple eƒe dɔtɔ miniti 2250 - 2250 = 2250. Jason ate ŋu aɖo dze kple eƒe dɔtɔ miniti 2250 - 300 = 2250. Jason ate ŋu aɖo dze kple eƒe dɔtɔ miniti 2250 - 2250 = 2250. Jason ate ŋu aɖo dze kple eƒe dɔtɔ miniti 2250 - 300 = 2250. Jason ate ŋu aɖo dze kple eƒe dɔtɔ miniti 2250 - 2250 = 2250. Jason ate ŋu aɖo dze kple eƒe dɔtɔ miniti 2250 - 300 = 2250. Jason ate ŋu aɖo dze kple eƒe dɔtɔ miniti 2250 - 300 = 2250. Jason ate ŋu aɖo dze kple eƒe dɔtɔ miniti

question: Koliko 24 le Griffin si eye wòtsɔ 5 na Kyle. Ena Billy Kyle tɔa ƒe teƒe eve. Ginger tsɔ eƒe koliko asiʋlo ɖeka na Griffin, emegbe Colby xɔ Kyle tɔa ƒe agbɔsɔsɔ si ʋete 3. Ne mlɔeba la, nuɖuɖu 27 ye nɔ Griffin si la, ke koliko nenie Ginger tsɔ na Griffin?
llm: <pad> Griffin xɔ Kyle tɔa ɖe 3 ɖe 27 = 9 Ginger tsɔ eƒe asiʋlo ɖeka na Griffin, ɖe 27 - 9 = 23</s>

question: Abɔbɔ 4 le nugo ɖeka me eye 32 le bubu me. Vovototo si le abɔbɔ siwo le nugo eveawo me ƒe agbɔsɔsɔ dome sɔ kple tɔmelã siwo le nugo eveawo me ƒe xexlẽme ƒe teƒe eve. Ne tɔmelã xexlẽme ɖekae le nugo eveawo siaa me la, ke tɔmelã nenie le nugo ɖesiaɖe me?
llm: <pad> Tɔmelã ɖeka le nugo ɖesiaɖe me.</s>

question: Jeanne ƒe atsyɔ̃ɖola be yeaxɔ dɔlar 250 le esi ɖe gaƒoƒo ɖeka ta. Ehiã be wòadzra ɖo nyuie hena sinima aɖe wɔwɔ si me wòazã gaƒoƒo 6 le gbesiagbe. Ele be wòawɔe zi 4 le kɔsiɖa me. Sinimaa xɔ kɔsiɖa 5 sɔŋ. Ne wowu sinima la nu vɔ la, atsɔ̃ɖola aɖe ga dzi kpɔtɔ na Jane 10 % le dɔ si wòwɔ ta. Ga home nenie Jane xe?
llm: <pad> Jane xɔ 250 * 10 / 100 = $25 le dɔ si wòwɔ ta.</s>

question: Isabelle ƒle nuzazãwo na nɔvianyɔnu suea ƒe dzigbezãɖuɖu. Ezã dɔlar 12 ɖe abolomenuwo ŋu, dɔlar 43 ɖe dzigbezã nunanawo ŋu, dɔlar 15 ɖe atsyɔ̃ɖonuwo ŋu, dɔlar 4 ɖe amekpegbalẽviwo ŋu eye wòzã dɔlar 22 ɖe akplo nyuiwo ŋu na amedzrowo. Ema ga si wògblẽ la ɖe mɔ etɔ̃ nu, le eya ŋutɔ kple edzila eveawo dome. Ga home nenie ame ɖesiaɖe xe?
Nuɖala aɖe ƒle sabala sako 4, siwo dometɔ ɖesiaɖe ƒe kpekpeme nye livre 50. Ne sabala livre ɖeka ƒe home nye dɔlar 1.50 la, ke ga home nenie wòzã?

Le Dzoɖagbe la, Sue ɖu kpɔnɔvivi siwo sɔ gbɔ wu nɔvianyɔnu tɔ zi gbɔ zi 4. Le Braɖagbe la, eɖu nu zi gbɔ zi eve wu nɔvianyɔnu. Nɔvianyɔnu ɖu kpɔnɔvivi 5 le Dzoɖagbe eye wòɖu 13 le ŋufɔke. Ne nuɖuɖumeŋusẽ 200 le kpɔnɔvivi 1 me la, ke nuɖuɖumeŋusẽ nenie Sue nɔvianyɔnu ɖu?
llm: <pad> Sue ɖu kpɔnɔvivi 5 * 4 = 20 le Dzoɖagbe. Sue ɖu kpɔnɔvivi 13 * 2 = 27 le ŋufɔke. Sue ɖu kpɔnɔvivi 20 + 27 = 47 le Dzoɖagbe. Sue ɖu kpɔnɔvivi 200 / 47 = 5 le ŋufɔke.</s>
